VirtueelGeheugen.Simulation.Hardware.Ram

Class RAM

  • java.lang.Object
    • VirtueelGeheugen.Simulation.Hardware.Ram.RAM

  • public class RAM
extends java.lang.Object
     Model for the RAM.

 contains:
    • The maximum amount of frames allowed in the RAM at once.
    • The maximum amount of processes allowed in he RAM at once.
    • A list of Frame objects.
    • A PriorityQueue of processes currently in RAM, keeping the LRU process at the front.
    • A boolean defining which algorithm to use.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Comparator used with the process list.

      • addProcess

        public Process addProcess(Process process,
                          int address,
                          int accessTime)
        Adding a process to the list. Used when process instruction is called. Calls scalePages(int address, int accessTime, boolean repage).
        Parameters:
        process - Process to be added.
        address - The address that has to be moved to RAM.
        accessTime - The current time of the running simulation.

      • addPage

        private int addPage(Process process,
                    int pageNumber)
        Method to set the information of a certain frame.
        Parameters:
        process - The process reference to be added to the Frame.
        pageNumber - The page number of the page being added.
        Returns:
        The frame number now taken.
